programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: The toss of a coin determines the value of a gold chain Les believes is out of fashion. A customer is upset when Seth prevents her from using the staff toilets.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: A woman rejects custom-made earrings, as she thought the term diamond cut meant they were diamonds. Seth puts his faith into younger sellers, believing they can outperform Les.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: An employee accidentally cracks the screen of a plasma-screen television. A customer becomes irate when the pneumatic hammer he is trying to sell does not work.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Experts explore the controversy surrounding the ancient Crystal Skulls, asking what powers might be unleashed if all 13 artefacts were brought together.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Investigations into the power of the number three in history, science and astronomy, and its possible links to extraterrestrial life.

programme.title: Outback Truckers
programme.desc: Twenty-year veteran trucker Yogi is on a mercy mission, leading a hay convoy to the drought-ravaged farmers of New South Wales..

programme.title: Outback Truckers
programme.desc: Livestock trucker Troy Coombe is facing wild weather and wild passengers, transporting two ostriches to their new home..

programme.title: American Restoration
programme.desc: Funk singer George Clinton challenges Rick and the team to return a 1920s grand piano to its former glory.

programme.title: American Restoration
programme.desc: Rick restores a 1950s table hockey game while the team work on a slot machine that rewards winners with cigars instead of money.

programme.title: Live at the Apollo
programme.sub-title: Sara Pascoe, Larry Dean, Gary Delaney
programme.desc: Sara Pascoe plays host in this show recorded before a packed house at London's Hammersmith Apollo, warming up the audience and then introducing routines by Larry Dean and Gary Delaney.

programme.title: Mock the Week
programme.desc: Dara O Briain and Hugh Dennis host a festive special and are joined by an array of top names form the UK comedy circuit including Ed Byrne, James Acaster, Tom Allen, Rhys James, Zoe Lyons, Ed Gamble, Miles Jupp, Nish Kumar and Romesh Ranganathan for quizzes, challenges, out-takes and unseen material.

programme.title: Room 101
programme.desc: Frank Skinner chairs the comedy panel show, inviting comedian Ross Noble, R'n'B singer Jamelia and academic Germaine Greer to compete to have their pet hates banished for ever. Their gripes include folk-dancing, health-and-safety, text speak, smelly people, actors and fun-runs.

programme.title: Room 101
programme.desc: Former deputy prime minister John Prescott, actress Rebecca Front and comedian Micky Flanagan join host Frank Skinner, making the case for their pet hates to be banished for ever. The trio's dislikes include goal celebrations, school ties, celebrity chefs, audience participation and other people's music.

programme.title: Mock the Week
programme.desc: Host Dara O Briain and regular panellist Hugh Dennis serve up their unique festive take in a Christmas special filled with seasonal material, out-takes, best bits and hitherto unseen moments.

programme.title: Porters
programme.desc: Simon breaks the hospital's new multi-million-pound surgical robot and has to fix it before a YouTube star goes under the knife.

programme.title: Beat the Internet with John Robins
programme.desc: The comedian hosts as members of the public are pitted against each other in a quest to predict how search engines respond to a series of questions.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: History Hunters
programme.desc: Documentary following father-and-son duo Dave and Steve Nuwar, who run a military antiques business. In the first edition, Dave takes a gamble when he makes one of his most expensive purchases ever. And with finances tight, the team head to Stratford fair to try and sell some treasures.

programme.title: Warbird Workshop
programme.desc: A team of engineers fight to return a veteran Westland Wessex helicopter to the skies - 30 years after its last flight.

programme.title: Napoleon: The Egyptian Campaign
programme.desc: Part two of two. How the 1798 military expedition to occupy Egypt was ultimately defeated, but secured a lasting legacy by marking the birth of Egyptology.

programme.title: The Normans
programme.desc: Historian Stephen Baxter explores his own theory that the Domesday Book was commissioned to confer revolutionary powers on the monarchy in the 11th century, and not intended as a means to collect taxes. He examines how the first great national survey, which recorded who owned every piece of land and property in England, was a massive logistical exercise that documented the traumatic impact of the Norman Conquest.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: Burke promises to help an old flame working for a politician who is in trouble for accepting funds from an underworld figure. The investigation into the criminal leads Burke to a shady escort agency, but the case and his reputation are jeopardised when he is caught on camera leaving the building after a raid by vice officers. Detective drama, starring Alex Norton.

programme.title: The Last Post
programme.desc: Joe's future in the army hangs in the balance, as Honor struggles to cope with the revelations about his secret past. Markham is torn between his duty and his conscience, while Armstrong fears for Yusra's safety.

programme.title: The White Princess
programme.desc: The pretender exposes King Henry's weaknesses, while Lizzie confronts new demons and old curses. Concluding the sequel to The White Queen, set in the Middle Ages as the War of the Roses comes to an end. Jodie Comer, Jacob Collins-Levy, Suki Waterhouse and Michelle Fairley star.

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: Gerry is forced to confront his past when the team reinvestigates the 33-year-old murder of a doctor whose body was found hanging from a meat hook on a butcher's stall at Smithfield Market. The butcher had gone missing on the same day, and since then the community has rallied to help his widow keep the business afloat. However, his recently discovered remains reveal a match to an unidentified person and lead to a shocking revelation for Sandra. Guest starring Ken Farrington, David Calder and Diana Quick, with Amanda Redman and Alun Armstrong.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Sophy Ridge on Sunday
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest news headlines, plus analysis of current affairs issues with leading politicians, a review of stories in the day's national newspapers and weather reports.

programme.title: The Trouble with Maggie Cole
programme.desc: Peter Cole is worried about the press interest following Maggie's interview and the online petition calling for his resignation over the scandal. Meanwhile, Alex is greeted at work by two money lenders, who have found him because his girlfriend Roxanna's picture appeared in the papers. Author Marcus Ormansby gives a talk at the school, and finds that romance is blossoming between him and Jill. Later, Maggie's visit to Kelly's salon is tense, but they have a heart to heart, leading Kelly to return home to husband Neil and take action over their 'lottery' money.

programme.title: Tenable
programme.desc: A team of five family and friends answer questions about top 10 lists from the realms of pop culture and general knowledge, then try to score a perfect 10 in the final round to take home the prize money. Hosted by Warwick Davis.

programme.desc: Text-based information service.

programme.title: Judge Rinder
programme.desc: Cameras follow criminal barrister Robert Rinder as he takes on real-life cases in a studio courtroom.

programme.title: Late Night Magic
programme.desc: We're taking you all the way through the night with soem of the best tracks of all time.

programme.title: The Kisstory Takeover
programme.desc: Kisstory is taking over with non-stop old skool and anthems.

programme.title: Up All Night! Kiss Beats
programme.desc: Let the world sleep! But here at Kiss we are still up, still delivering the finest beats for your nocturnal jam.

programme.title: Chart Hits & New Vids
programme.desc: We've got all the hits that are storming the charts right now, along with some brand new releases from your favourite and new artists.

programme.title: Hit After Hit
programme.desc: Nothing but the biggest hits by your favourite stars back to back.

programme.title: Cooper's Treasure
programme.desc: The previous season, Darrell Miklos located a shipwreck tied to Christopher Columbus using Cooper's intel. Now, he has eight weeks' of cash left to find another shipwreck that he can salvage.

programme.title: Houdini's Last Secrets
programme.desc: A team of experts recreates the famed bullet catch trick to uncover how Houdini could have accomplished it.

programme.title: Supertruckers
programme.desc: Sergeant Major visits Spain on a top-secret mission transporting the British Army's brand new scout vehicle from Seville to Newport, Wales. Plus, Trucker Tom faces a midnight run.

programme.title: American Chopper
programme.desc: Paul Teutul Sr arranges for work to be done on the shop in exchange for building custom bikes for the contractors.

programme.title: Fantomworks
programme.desc: Steve has only driven his 1969 Camaro Z28 at five miles-per-hour, though he still wants it to be a muscle car beast. Scott wants to revive a rare matching numbers 1964 Corvette.

programme.title: Fantomworks
programme.desc: Tom asks Dan to find him a rare 1967 Camaro Convertible with factory air conditioning. However, when Dan finds the Unicorn, the car is too good to cut up.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: Revealing how items such as sidecars, frozen French toast, refrigerator compressors and superchargers are made.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: Revealing how items such as sidecars, frozen French toast, refrigerator compressors and superchargers are made.

programme.title: My 600lb Life
programme.desc: Following the lives of people, each weighing over 600lbs. Through their year-long journeys, they attempt to lose thousands of pounds collectively, to survive.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Officers find themselves having to reassemble a computer disk cut up with pinking shears in order to solve a brutal murder case.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Tiny pieces of plastic - the size of grains of sand - provide police with clues after a bombing in which a man was killed.

programme.title: Murder on CCTV
programme.desc: When Rhonda Daugherty vanished, detectives turned to the public for information. A tip led to surveillance footage from a hotel that uncovered a journey of deceit.

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: The deaths of Alabama country store owner Billy Triplett and his wife Debbie in June 2001. Locals suspected their fate must have been connected with his illegal side-business of retailing alcohol. However, when word of a bloodstained stash of money reached investigators, they were shocked to realise the identity of the person wishing to conceal it.

programme.title: FBI Files
programme.desc: Bureau agents up with police to launch a complex operation to catch a violent gang of thieves that specialises in targeting armoured cars.

programme.title: Animal Cops Detroit
programme.desc: The investigators travel to the city's west side to investigate reports of a dog in distress and find the animal is entangled in wire.

programme.title: Bondi Vet
programme.desc: Pluto the singing dog is having problems with his voice, causing concern for Dr Chris. Tim tackles a territorial Tasmanian Devil, and can Lisa save a desperately ill kitten?.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Featuring Sarah, a plus-size bride who has tried on nearly 20 unsatisfactory dresses, and Sofia, who wants to lose more than a stone for her big day.
